'''Drunkards' Farce''' is [[Diona]]'s [[4th Ascension Passive]].

==Gameplay Notes==
* Despite what the description states, the ATK decrease is not applied to opponents immediately when they enter the AoE of Drunken Mist created by Signature Mix. Instead it is applied periodically to enemies inside the AoE every time Drunken Mist's damage and healing over time activate.
